page.title: 14Children's Favourite Games 1
page.content: There are a number of games played in the playground popular ones are Irish Tig and Last one in the Semi. Irish Tig is played by a group of people one of whom is'On'.Time is allowed for this person to escape before all the others try to catch him. The person who is 'on' tries to avoid capture by dodging then if he is caught then it is someone else's turn to be 'On'. Another group game Last one in the semi needs one person in the middle of the playground the others at one end. The one in the middle calls a person's nam e and they have to try to run to the other end of the playground without being caught.If they succeed then all the others run down the playground,anyone caught is the person put in the middle.Any amount of children take part in these games.
